description:
PSA: This Course will no longer be available June 30th 2016 onwards
                            Coursera announced that they will be shutting off their old platform on June 30th. Over  400 courses that are part
                                of the old stack will be no longer be available. You can find the  complete list here.
                            
                            

                            
                                Read this guide to learn how to download this course before the old platform shuts down. 

                                The guide provides two ways to download the courses - Chrome Plugin and Python Script. Depending on which method you use, check the appropriate sections below for further details.
                            
                            
                            
                                To download this course you need to be enrolled in the course.
                                                                    You can enroll for the course here:
                                    https://www.coursera.org/course/apstat
                                                            

                            Chrome Plugin

                                                            You can download the course materials for this course by visiting the following url (you need to be logged in):
                                                                        https://class.coursera.org/apstat-002/lecture
                                
                            
                            Python Script
                            
                                                                For the python script to work you will need a class name. Pick one from below:
                                                                    apstat-001
                                                                    apstat-002
                                
                                
                                If more than one class name below, pick the last one. If the script fails, pick the one above that and try again. Not all of these class names are guranteed to work.


                            






                        
                    
                    This course reviews the topics for the AP Statistics Exam. Each week of the six week review will include review videos for an important block of material, complete with videos of worked example problems and exam tips. There will also be an extensive online quiz given each week, with multiple problem versions that students can use to practice, along with a practice test to help students prepare for the AP* Statistics Exam.* AP Statistics is a registered trademark of the College Board, which was not involved in the production of, and does not endorse, this product.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1:      Univariate Data and Probability
Week 2:      Discrete and Continuous Distributions
Week 3:      Bivariate Data, Sampling and Experiments
Week 4:      Estimation and Confidence Intervals and Begin Tests of Significance
Week 5:      Tests of Significance
Week 6:      Exam Practice and Tips
title: Preparing for the AP* Statistics Exam
